org.streaminer.stream.avg

Class MovingAverage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.streaminer.stream.avg.MovingAverage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAverage

    public class MovingAverage
extends Object
implements IAverage
    A simple moving average is a method for computing an average of a stream of numbers by only averaging the last P numbers from the stream, where P is known as the period. Source code: .
